New Records: Joel Embiid scored a season-high 37 points
Key Match Events: Embiid's season-high 37 points, Embiid's dominant performance on both ends of the floor, Embiid's ability to read the defense and drive to the basket, Maxey's consistent performance and ability to get into the paint off the dribble
Pre-Game Insights: The Sixers are returning to a state of normalcy, the team is focusing on themselves and making adjustments on the floor, Embiid's health is a key factor in the team's success
Post-Match Reflections: Embiid's performance was a strong indication that he's getting back to full health, the team's defensive mentality is starting to pay off, the Sixers are starting to consistently play well
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Sixers have won eight of their last 10 games, they have won 10 of their last 13 games, the team is tied for the final Play-In spot, Embiid's ability to use his left hand is a point of emphasis
Others: The team's rotation is still being figured out, the defense is wreaking havoc with Paul George, Caleb Martin, and Kelly Oubre on the floor together, Embiid's pump fake and pace are key components of his game
